body_html: Also, curiously, the use of weights is fine if I use a keras model and train that rather than an Estimator, even if I convert it to an Estimator first using the tf.keras.estimator.model_to_estimator call.
body_text: Also, curiously, the use of weights is fine if I use a keras model and train that rather than an Estimator, even if I convert it to an Estimator first using the tf.keras.estimator.model_to_estimator call.
body: Also, curiously, the use of `weights` is fine if I use a `keras` model and train that rather than an `Estimator`, even if I convert it to an `Estimator` first using the `tf.keras.estimator.model_to_estimator` call.
